name: Zweinflugger!
description:
Zweinflugger!
At the end of the second world war, two aircraft were found in a burnt-out bunker. The powerful forces that put these aircraft in motion continue to mystify the scientists and engineers who tried to replicate them.

Years later, a global alien invasion comes close to destroying all of earth's military forces, the "Flugger" aircraft are our only hope!

You and a friend will take control of a "Flugger" each (or if you're feeling particularly brave, you can fly both at the same time), and you will fend off the alien forces! Good luck and god speed, pilots!
